level.heading: RENTAL HOUSING CASES – FINAL ORDERS (ยง 1-2937)

level.text: 2937.1 OAH shall serve all final orders on the parties by first-class mail.
OAH also shall serve all final orders on the Rent Administrator and theommission.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674, 5681 (July 14, 2006); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12582 (December1, 2010).
